#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
#define gc getchar
#else
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#endif // ONLINE_JUDGE

using namespace std;

inline int scanint(){
    char c = gc();
    int x = 0;
    while(c<'0'||c>'9'){
        c=gc();
    }
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=gc();
    }
    return x;
}

int main(){
int t,i,n,x,maxand,j,ans;
int A[100001];
t = scanint();
while(t--){
    n = scanint();
    for(i=0;i<n;++i){
        A[i] = scanint();
    }
    maxand = 0;
   sort(A,A+n);
   for(i=0;i<n-1;++i){
    maxand = max(A[i]&A[i+1], maxand);
   }
    printf("%d\n",maxand);
}

return 0;
}
